info.name: 4:3 Amazon Video
info.description: View 4:3 Amazon Video in a full screen, even if it's occupying only the left or half side of the screen.
info.additionalInfo:
This is an Amazon Video version of style 118561.

I cannot guarantee total functionality with widescreen videos, so you may need to toggle this setting. It should be sufficient for 4:3 binge-watching sessions, though. :)
